root.name: TNA iMPACT!
root.description: OverviewTNA iMPACT! is a pro-wresting game based on the Total Nonstop Acton promotion. Developed and published by Midway, the game brings to fans many of their favorite wrestlers in both likeness and voice, and allows them to duke it out in fast-paced matches with less emphasis on the submission maneuvers found in many pro-wrestling games and more on combative wrestling moves. AJ Styles, Samoa Joe, Christopher Daniels, Senshi, Sonjay Dutt, and Jeff Jarrett were brought in to provide the motion capture animations for the game. Every real life TNA wrestler had their bodies scanned in for an authentic look and an original character was made specifically for the game, Suicide, who jumped into reality on TNA programming shortly after the game's release. StoryThe story revolves around the wrestler Suicide who fights his way back to the top of TNA after receiving a severe beating and left for dead in Mexico. After his vicious attack, Suicide has a plastic surgery procedure done introducing his new look (the player's created wrestler) and has no recollection as to who he is or what happened to him. Players then participate in matches in the middle of nowhere leading to a tryout and eventually a spot on the TNA roster. Once with TNA you will fight your way through all 3 tiers (tag, X-Division World Heavyweight) regaining memories along the way until you finally remember who you are and what happened to you. WrestlersTNA iMPACT! features 25 of TNA's finest wrestlers and 5 bonus characters but excludes the TNA Knockouts. Roster: AJ Styles Samoa Joe Booker T Christian Cage Christopher Daniels Hernandez Homicide Jay Lethal Kurt Angle Sting Rhino Tomko Jeff Jarrett Abyss Senshi Scott Steiner Chris Sabin Alex Shelley Eric Young Shark Boy Kevin Nash Robert Roode James Storm Sonjay Dutt Brother Ray Brother Devon DLC Characters: Petey Williams Curry Man Mike Tenay Matches Standard Tag Team Free For All Ultimate X Ultimate X Free For All Submission Falls Count Anywhere Falls Count Anywhere Tag Handicap OnlineThe Xbox 360 and Playstation 3 versions of the game enable players to battle online with up to two players. Players cannot take created wrestlers online. Style PointsTNA iMPACT! has a points system known as Style Points, you earn style points by performing moves during matches. The points can be used to unlock new Wrestlers, Arenas and CAW Moves. Unlockables Unlockable Wrestlers Abyss: Defeat Abyss during Story Mode Brother Ray: Defeat Team 3D during Story Mode Eric Young: Win the tag match with Eric Young during Story Mode Jay Lethal: Defeat Jay Lethal during Story Mode Kevin Nash: Defeat Kevin Nash during Story Mode Sonjay Dutt: Defeat Sonjay Dutt during Story Mode Tomko: Defeat Tomko AJ Styles in the Tag Team match during Story Mode Jeff Jarrett: Complete Story mode. Suicide: Complete Story mode. Don West: Accumulate 250,000 Style Points. Senshi: Accumulate 200,000 Style Points. Benny: Accumulate 350,000 Style Points. Lenny: Accumulate 400,000 Style Points. Afro Thunder: Accumulate 750,000 Style Points in the PlayStation3, Xbox 360 or Wii version. Unlockable Arenas Armory: Win all your matches in the Armory Arena during Story Mode Freedom Center: Win all your matches in the Freedom Center Arena during Story Mode Japan: Win all of your matches in Japan during Story Mode Mexico: Win the Gauntlet Match in Mexico during Story Mode Vegas: Win your match in the Vegas Arena during Story Mode England: Accumulate 420,000 Style Points. Unlockable CAW Moves Wheelbarrow Neckbreaker: 120,000 Style Points Full Nelson Suplex: 130,000 Style Points Basement Dropkick: 140,000 Style Points Crotch Punch: 156,000 Style Points Twisting Crossbody: 184,000 Style Points Tornado DDT: 192,000 Style Points The Book End: 200,000 Style Points Eye Rake: 208,000 Style Points Neckbreaker: 216,000 Style Points Tailbreaker: 232,000 Style Points The Cradle Shock: 240,000 Style Points Jawbreaker: 240,000 Style Points Leg Sweep: 252,000 Style Points German Suplex: 268,000 Style Points Dragon Suplex: 280,000 Style Points The Border Toss: 290,000 Style Points Atomic Drop: 312,000 Style Points The Gore: 320,000 Style Points Hurricanrana: 332,000 Style Points Running Neckbrkr: 340,000 Style Points The Gringo Killer: 360,000 Style Points Mexican Head Scissors: 376,000 Style Points Cutter: 388,000 Style Points Hangman's Neckbreaker: 400,000 Style Points Sonjay Cutter: 615,600 Style Points The Steiner Recliner: 648,000 Style Points The Styles Clash: 680,400 Style Points The Stroke: 712,800 Style Points The Unprettier: 745,200 Style Points The Black Hole Slam: 777,600 Style Points The Angle Slam: 842,400 Style Points Canadian Destroyer: 972,000 Style Points
